arts.ttl: Real Madrid Player Ratings vs. WSG Tirol: Kylian Mbappé Stars in 4-0 Victory
arts.sum: The match marked a few special occasions for the club: Vinícius Júnior donned the captain’s armband, Álvaro Carreras made his debut and Éder Militão earned his first start since suffering an ACL injury last November. It only took Brahim Díaz, who got the nod on the right wing in place of Rodrygo, 10 minutes to find Militão for the game’s opening goal.

arts.ttl: Official: Real Madrid starting lineup to face WSG Tirol
arts.sum: Real Madrid will play their second and final pre-season friendly match tonight as they take on Austrian club WSG Tirol in Innsbruck in a little over an hour. arts.ttl: WSG Tirol vs. Real Madrid: How to Watch Preseason Friendly on TV, Live Stream
arts.sum: Supporters around the world can tune into Real Madrid’s sole preseason friendly of the summer via Real Madrid TV . The club were unsuccessful in their efforts to postpone their first game of the league season at home to Osasuna, but will have a couple of extra days to prepare with the fixture scheduled for next Tuesday.

arts.ttl: Carreras, Brahim start in a 4-3-3: How Real Madrid can line up against WSG Tirol
arts.sum: Real Madrid will take to the pitch today for their first and only official pre-season friendly of the summer, facing Austrian side WSG Swarovski Tirol. This will be the Spanish giants’ first open match since 9 July, excluding a closed-door game against Leganes earlier this week. arts.ttl: Real Madrid Predicted Lineup vs. WSG Tirol: Mbappe and Vinicius Start, Carreras Debut
arts.sum: RB: Trent Alexander-Arnold —The Englishman’s injury altered Alonso’s tactical plan for their Club World Cup semifinal defeat to Paris Saint-Germain, with the Spaniard previously utilising Alexander-Arnold as a wing-back. The revamped Club World Cup thrust the preseason schedules of the European clubs competing into disarray, and Real Madrid have just one friendly arranged before the start of the 2025–26 season.

arts.sum: Real Madrid will fly out to Austria for their pre-season friendly match against WSG Tirol set to take place tomorrow in Innsbruck. Having played a training match against Leganes at Valdebebas last week, this game will be the last friendly for Xabi Alonso’s men before the start of the 2025/26 La Liga season. arts.sum: With the new season only a week away, Real Madrid are working hard on their preparations for the opening fixture against Osasuna. arts.ttl: WSG Tirol vs Real Madrid Preview: Start Time, Team News, How To Watch & Live Stream
arts.sum: While there, they will face Austrian Bundesliga side WSG Tirol on August 12, their only pre-season friendly not behind closed doors. Last week, they faced La Liga 2 side Leganes in a behind-closed-doors friendly match, winning 4-1 thanks to goals from Brahim Diaz, Dean Huijsen, Eder Militao, and Thiago Pitarch.
